name: Springdoku
description:
Springdoku is a small puzzle game in which you move flowers around to satisfy the rules shown on the edges of the grid.

You'll have to experiment to work out exactly what each rule means... good luck!

Click and drag flowers to change their positions.

Certain levels contain a timer. If it stresses you out, you can tap on it to hide it for a more relaxing game.

I made this game for a two day game jam with some former colleagues of mine. The theme was "Spring".
